My Motorola Atrix HD phone works with My Monster rancher
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): My Motorola Atrix HD phone works with My Monster rancher
By Darkling on Friday, December 14, 2012 - 07:55 am:

Wasnt sure where to post this, so here it is.

My Motorola Atrix HD phone works with My Monster rancher.

By Shen the Keeper on Friday, December 14, 2012 - 09:20 am:

It'll also run on 'BlueStacks' an Android emulator for Windows.

Searching for 'My Monster Rancher' on it might not show up, but 'My Monster' does have it on the list as maybe the second entry.

I'm still testing it mind you on a test account, but so far its worked, though not 100% stable.

-Shen/DragonParadox

By Shen the Keeper on Friday, December 14, 2012 - 09:37 am:

Oh, yes. I know emulators are normally frowned upon here, but since Android is OpenSource and you can get a developer kit for free, I figured it's ok. ;)

By Shen the Keeper on Saturday, December 15, 2012 - 07:58 am:

Ok, I seem to have trouble getting BlueStacks to work consistantly. I don't know if its the ancient computer I'm using or it's just barely compatible with MMR.. so it might not be an option. There are other pc android emulators though.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, December 15, 2012 - 10:43 am:
